description: This file defines a C++ class 'Notification' within the namespace WebSockets::JsonRpc, inheriting from a base message class. It includes constructor, destructor, and utility methods, and appears to be part of a JSON-RPC notification handling component.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: A class representing a WebSockets JSON-RPC notification message, providing methods for string representation and validity checks.
